g.text: I want to send to MSISDN 260795390415
Yes, it's Mulenga Kapwepwe. She can receive in ZMW
Yes, it's Mulenga Kapwepwe. She can receive in ZMW
Hmmm. Upile can only send in MWK.
I need to get some currency conversion
What FXPs do you know about?
What FXPs do you know about?
Here are the available FXPs:FDH FX
I'll ask FDH FX to perform my conversion
Here is the initial version of the transfer.
Please quote me for the currency conversion.
Here is the initial version of the transfer.
Please quote me for the currency conversion.
OK, so I need to figure this out...
I will add a 150 MWK fee for undertaking the conversion.
Now I'll set an expiry time, sign the quotation object,
create an ILPV4 prepare packet and return it in the intermediary object.
NOTE: the ILPV4 prepare packet contains the following items, all encoded:
- The amount being sent (i.e. in the source currency)
- The content of the conversion terms
Please quote for a transfer which sends 97 ZMW.
(5000 MWK converted to ZMW, less 3 ZMW in FXP fees.
Fees will be taken out of the amount sent by the FXP.
So the total which will be received by Zoona will be:
D2-->S1:202 I'll get back to you
D2->D2:OK, so I will charge 2 ZMW for this.\nNow I sign the transaction object\nand return it to the Debtor DFSP
OK, I can see that there are going to be 5 ZMW in charges.
This is derived from the source and target amounts in the quotation.
Hi, Upile: I can do the transfer.
It'll cost you 250 MWK in fees
Let me know if you want to go ahead
Please confirm your part of the transfer
OK, so this is an FX confirmation.
Does the sender have an account in this currency?
Liquidity check and reserve on Debtor DFSP's account
Please confirm the currency conversion part of the transfer
If so, send the fulfilment back
Check fulfilment matches and cancel if not.
Conversion succeeded subject to transfer success
Now I can send the transfer itself
Does the debtor hold an account in ZMW? No.
Is there a dependent transfer? Yes
Perform liquidity check and reserve funds
against creditor party to dependent transfer
NBS_Bank has a reservation of 5000 MWK
FDH_FX has a reservation of 97 ZMW
Let me check that the terms of the dependent transfer
are the same as the ones I agreed to
and that the fulfilment and condition match
Yes, they do. I approve the transfer
Transfer is confirmed, here's the fulfilment
Is this dependency against the debtor party to the transfer?
Create an obligation from the debtor party to the party named in the dependency (the FXP)
Is the transfer denominated in the currency of the payee receive amount?
Create an obligation from the party named in the dependency
to the creditor party for the transfer
You can clear it in your ledgers
Let's just check: does this match the stuff I sent?
It does. Great. I'll clear the conversion
NBS_Bank has a debit of 5000 MWK
FDH_FX has a credit of 5000 MWK
FDH_FX has a debit of 97 ZMW
Zoona has a credit of 97 ZMW
Commit the funds in my ledgers
